name: qop 4
description:
qop 4 is a minimalistic puzzle which goal is to get the cube to finish using 4 directions in space. The difficulty increases due to the unique cubes - angular, teleports and lock cubes.
- FullHD
- 60 levels (from simple to insufferably difficult)
- Smooth animation
- Pleasant music
- Intuitive interface
- Steam achievements

"qop" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
Color scheme borrowed from the beautiful game HOOK
